```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
df <- read_excel("data/Alumni-Engagement-Market-Research-Master-List.xlsx")
df <- df %>% select(Rank, Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4, Q5, Q6, Q42, Q43, Q44, Q45)
df <- df[-1,]
df <- lapply(df, factor)
df <- df %>% mutate_all(funs(factor(.)))
df

lm1 <- lm(Q44 ~., data = df)
summary(lm1)
```
